summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of 29th Avenue from North line of 30th Avenue Addition to East Cherry Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer, under Ordinance No. 12302, creating Local Improvement District No. 1071 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
